Plot: The story of a young Jack, newly released from serving a prison sentence for a crime he committed as a child.
Title: Boy A
Actors: Andrew Garfield, Peter Mullan, Siobhan Finneran, Alfie Owen
tomatoConsensus: Small in scale but large in impact, Boy A's career making performances (particularly that by star Andrew Garfield) and carefully crafted characters defy judgment and aggressively provoke debate.
